article_title: Huge crowd braves storm for Cruz

article_metadata.author: Doug Ireland direland@eagletribune.com

og.description: SALEM, N.H. — It may have been too snowy for Donald Trump to campaign in New Hampshire on Friday, but the weather didn’t stop his top Republican opponent, Texas Sen.
